Lielupe

Personally, I find the bridge over the Lielupe really interesting, which was built 63 years ago (1959) and renovated in 2016. The building is 274m long. I really like this bridge because it is reminds me of New York, reminiscent of the George Washington Bridge in New York, though of course, it is many times larger and on several levels. This bridge reminds me of our family trip to North America every time.
